column1: in memory of everett cox -- w. e. pegues funeral directors| send card everett cox. november 12
column3: 2015. biography everett coxtupelo - everett eugene cox
column8: at the north mississippi medical center. he was born november 12
column10: to everett wilder and irene kingsley cox. everett was an active and faithful member of st. luke united methodist church where he attended every sunday with the help of loving members of the church and he was well loved. services will be wednesday
column13: at 3 p. m. at the jefferson street chapel of w. e. pegues with rev. rick brooks officiating. a graveside will follow at tupelo memorial park. survivors include two sisters
column14: josephine harbor and pam cox; four brothers
column16: gerald and terry cox and larry taylor; nieces
column21: jason and bobby; several great-nieces and great-nephews; and great-great nieces and nephews. he was preceded in death by both parents
column23: bonnie huey. visitation will be from 11 a. m. until 3 p. m. at w. e. pegues
column24: tupelo. expressions of sympathy may be left at www. peguesfuneralhome. com
